With each hand they hold censers as numerous as the sands of the Ganges river, using them to scatter incense, flower garlands, ointments, powders, clothing, jeweled canopies, banners, and pennants - all the adornments are likewise.

Furthermore, in each instant of thought they traverse the ten directions, and in the time of a single thought they pervade the ten directions, manifesting the attainment of perfect enlightenment up to nirvana, the empowered lands and adornments, and manifesting immeasurable bodies throughout the three times.
